Description: Verify that a user can successfully reserve a parking spot through the app.
Verify that payment can be completed using a valid debit card.
Verify that available parking spaces update in real-time on the dashboard.
Verify the system generates a daily report showing parking trends.
Verify an alert is triggered when all parking spots are taken.
Verify the admin can access and browse historical parking reports.
Verify login functionality using correct and incorrect credentials.
Verify that the system displays correctly in English and Malay.
Verify that a user can cancel their reservation before arrival.
Verify that user activities are properly recorded in the system log.
